A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Created an account just to write this! This was not a great movie. Lots of inconsistencies\, things that just don't make any sense. Ryan seemed to take everything JJ setup in Ep 7 and just discarded it\, leaving our 2 year wait for answers a frustrating waste of time. Now we have new questions that we will have to wait another 2 years to answer. It really seems like the writes/directors didn't talk to eachother or work together to comeup with a congruent story at all. The special effects were cool\, but there was very little I actually enjoyed about this movie.
